title: Drawing, "Distant View of the Volcanos Tolima and Ruiz from the Vicinity of Tequendama Falls, Colombia", June 1853
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on olive paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with figures and at various locations: very rich in trees / rock / ferns / 2 ochrous orange mixed with gray / 3 Brownish Bushes and small herbage / Snowpeaks Tolima and Ruiz - from the vicinity  of Tequendama Falls; followed by the date.
description: Horizontal view of the banks of a steep valley with a stream shown in the foreground.  Ridges and peaks are in the middle distance.  The range from which the snow capped peaks rise is in the background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Distant View of the Volcanos Tolima and Ruiz from the Vicinity of Tequendama Falls, Colombia", June 1853.
June 1853. Graphite, brush and white gouache on olive paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-65.
